Text:
"The report was released with little fanfare on April 7"
They missed their deadline of April 1st.

BTW, if you put your head, where they keep theirs, after exploding, you'll never be constipated again.
I would think that would be the least of your worries.

When you get to my age, it can be a daily concern.
TMI, right?
Anywho, I'm like Glenn, I know who's really in control of this administration, and know who's more powerful than him. So I don't worry, but I DO prepare.
